serviceInfo.title: Tennessee Serves
serviceInfo.description:
A Note from the First Lady

I invite you to join us as we transform our state through service. Our monthly newsletter will keep you informed on where we will be serving and how you can join us. You can also follow along on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter with #TennesseeServes.

Thank you for learning more about Tennessee Serves. I hope you will join us in serving our state, by serving your community, by serving one person at a time. Join us as Tennessee Serves!

serviceList.title: TN Kids Serve Summer Challenge
serviceList.description: Statewide Tennessee Kids Serve Summer Challenge

serviceInfo.title: TN Kids Serve Summer Challenge
serviceInfo.description:
First Lady Maria Lee invites all Tennessee elementary students (grades rising K – rising 6th) to participate in her statewide Tennessee Kids Serve Summer Challenge: a calling to motivate young Tennesseans to serve their state, give back to their communities and care for their neighbors during the summer.

The challenge will start on June 1, 2020 and will conclude on August 1, 2020.

serviceList.title: kidcentral tn
serviceList.description: kidcentral tn is a one-stop shop for Tennessee families to raise healthy and happy kids

serviceInfo.title: kidcentral tn
serviceInfo.description:
Welcome!

kidcentral tn is a one-stop shop for Tennessee families to raise healthy and happy kids. Find parenting tips, track child milestones and access TN state resources.

serviceList.title: TN Early Intervention System
serviceList.description: TEIS offers therapy and services for children that may have a developmental delay or disability

serviceInfo.title: Tennessee Early Intervention System
serviceInfo.description: Do you know a baby or toddler that may have a developmental delay or disability? TEIS offers therapy and services for children ages birth up to 3 years old. Anyone can submit a referral and TEIS professionals will set up an evaluation to see if the child qualifies for free services.

serviceList.title: PickTN
serviceList.description: Dedicated to connecting people everywhere to all of the great things that come from Tennessee farms and food businesses

serviceInfo.title: PickTN
serviceInfo.description: Pick Tennessee Products is part of the Tennessee Department of Agriculture, dedicated to connecting people everywhere to all of the great things that come from Tennessee farms and food businesses. These directories connect you with approximately 2600 Tennessee farm-direct and food businesses. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube to find fresh, local, fun from the farm.

serviceList.title: TN State Museum
serviceList.description: The Tennessee State Museum is designed to bring history to life

serviceInfo.title: Tennessee State Museum
serviceInfo.description: The Tennessee State Museum's new 137,000-square-foot facility is designed to bring history to life. It includes a "Tennessee Time Tunnel" chronicling the state's rich history, a hands-on children's gallery, six changing galleries, a state-of-the-art digital learning center, a grand hall and second-floor veranda. Located in the heart of Nashville, at the corner of Rosa Parks Boulevard and Jefferson Street, the new museum sits at the foot of Capitol Hill and overlooks Bicentennial Mall State Park. There is no admission charge for visitors.

serviceList.title: Veterans Services
serviceList.description: Veterans Services connects Veterans of all eras to the benefits they have earned, and maintains the state cemeteries that serve them

serviceInfo.title: Veterans Services
serviceInfo.description: Tennessee Department of Veterans Services connects Veterans of all eras to the benefits they have earned, and maintains the state cemeteries that serve them. If you have questions please click the customer inquiry on the next page or please call 615-741-2345 for assistance and if you want to preregister for burial service click preregistration and select your region.

serviceList.title: TN Wildlife Resources Agency
serviceList.description: TWRA site provides license and permits, harvest, game check activity and more

serviceInfo.title: Tennessee Wildlife Resources Agency
serviceInfo.description:
Some of the features available through the TWRA site are as follows:

  • Purchase your license and permits
  • Submit harvest reports and game check activity
  • Register or renew your vessel online
  • Check application status
  • Obtain replacement registration cards and decals
  • View and apply for open quota hunt events
  • Update your application and hunt choices online
  • View and manage your customer account
  • And more

serviceList.description: Helps attract investments and expansions to make TN #1 in the Southeast for high quality jobs

serviceInfo.title: Mastered in Tennessee
serviceInfo.description: The Tennessee Department of Economic & Community Development helps attract investments and expansions to make TN #1 in the Southeast for high quality jobs.

serviceList.title: Restaurant Inspection Scores
serviceList.description: To protect, promote and improve the health and prosperity of people in Tennessee

serviceInfo.title: Restaurant Inspection Scores
serviceInfo.description: The mission of the Tennessee Department of Health (TDH) is to protect, promote and improve the health and prosperity of people in Tennessee. The Environmental Health Program permits and inspects restaurants and other food establishments in the state. Learn more about TDH services and programs at www.tn.gov/health.

serviceList.title: TN Vacation
serviceList.description: Home of the blues, bluegrass, country, gospel, soul, rockabilly and rock 'n' roll-delivering an unparalleled experience of beauty, history and family adventure, infused with music

serviceInfo.title: TN Vacation
serviceInfo.description: Tennessee is the home of the blues, bluegrass, country, gospel, soul, rockabilly and rock 'n' roll-delivering an unparalleled experience of beauty, history and family adventure, infused with music that creates a vacation that is "The Soundtrack of America. Made in Tennessee."

serviceList.title: Driver Services Online
serviceList.description: The Department of Safety and Homeland Security provides the driver services electronically

serviceInfo.title: Driver Services Online
serviceInfo.description:
The Department of Safety and Homeland Security provides the following driver services electronically:

  • Renewing Driver's License
  • Ordering Duplicate License
  • Reissuing License
  • Change my Address
  • Apply for Teen/Graduated Driver License
  • Find forms and publications
  • Map of Driver Licenses Stations
  • And More

Please select the button shown below to access these services.

serviceList.title: Felony Offender Information
serviceList.description: Felony offenders who have ever been in the custody of the Tennessee Department of Correction

serviceInfo.title: Felony Offender Information
serviceInfo.description: The information available in this application pertains to the Tennessee felony offenders who have ever been in the custody of the Tennessee Department of Correction. More detailed information should be obtained from the originating jurisdiction. Information such as individual’s current status (e.g., inmate, probation, parole) or parole eligibility is available to citizens free of charge. Official statewide background checks are available from the Tennessee Bureau of Investigations.

serviceList.title: COVID-19 Unified Command Hub
serviceList.description: COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by the novel coronavirus

serviceInfo.title: COVID-19 Unified Command Hub
serviceInfo.description:
COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by the novel coronavirus. This new virus and disease were unknown to the population before the outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019.

Visit the site for more information, maps and resources about the coronavirus response in Tennessee.

serviceList.title: TEMA Emergency
serviceList.description: TEMA supports local jurisdictions during emergencies in managing the flow of assets, services, and teams to address the emergency

serviceInfo.title: TEMA Emergency
serviceInfo.description: TEMA supports local jurisdictions during emergencies in managing the flow of assets, services, and teams to address the emergency; activating the State Emergency Operations Center to coordinate and communicate with critical emergency functions; and reaching out for mutual aid from from other departments or agencies of the state, from local jurisdictions, from other states, and from the federal government.
